entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to a few flurries after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
